metadata.title: CVE-2020-12474 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Telegram Desktop through 2.0.1, Telegram through 6.0.1 for Android, andTelegram through 6.0.1 for iOS allow an IDN Homograph attack via Punycodein a public URL or a group chat invitation URL.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
